___name.description: Name of the file with extension

___uploadedDate.description: Date and time when the file was uploaded

___createDate.description: Date and time when the file definition was created

___sourcePath.description: The path to the file location

___loaded.description: Flag that indicates whether the file is loaded

___createDate.description: Date and time when the upload definition was created

___metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes, provided by the server (client should not provide)
